title: Luxury Apartment in Wicker Park Amenity Building
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post
I'm looking for someone to take over my lease in Wicker Park in one of the only amenity buildings in the neighborhood!
You would be taking on the current lease that runs through 6/30/2023, with an option to renew thereafter.
The current lease is priced SIGNIFICANTLY less expensive than the current listing price.
Base rent of $2,495 vs other 1 bedroom units in the building going for $2,650-$3,075 (and none of those even have a walk-in closet!).
636 sf, 1bed /1 bath, laundry in unit, walk in closet, gorgeous views.
Also includes parking in secure underground garage, and all utilities except electric.
Building amenities include fitness center, rooftop pool/residents lounge, business center, package room, controlled access.
Move in any time between 7/16 and 7/30, and rent is covered through the end of July!
Please reach out with any questions!
Working on pictures to share, and happy to give tours starting Monday 6/19.
